src:
5 Pesepak Bola Dunia dengan Jam Tangan Mewahnya, Bernilai Miliaran
01 Nov 2019, 07:50 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Dengan nama besar dan prestasi mentereng, wajar saja bila para pesepak bola dunia punya gaya hidup yang glamor. Dengan gaji setinggi langit, normal-normal saja jika para pemain bola menunjukkan kemewahan ke hadapan publik.
Saat berada di luar lapangan, para pesepak bola tersebut kerap menunjukkan kemewahan lewat gaya hidupnya. Beberapa penunjang gaya hidup yang diperlihatkan ialah kendaraan, rumah, hingga pakaian.
Tak hanya itu, ada aksesoris dengan harga mahal. Satu di antara aksesoris yang sering ditunjukkan ialah jam tangan. Bagi banyak orang, benda tersebut bisa jadi simbol kemewahan pemakainya. Beberapa pemain bola dunia kerap menunjukkan jam tangan mewahnya saat di luar lapangan.
Berapa harga jam tangan mewah para pemain bola tersebut? Berikut penjelasannya.
text:
5 World Footballers with Luxury Watches, Worth Billions
Nov 1, 2019, 07:50 by Bola.net
Bola.net - With big names and flashy achievements, it's only natural that the world footballers have a glamorous lifestyle. With salaries as high as the sky, it's normal for footballers to show luxury to the public.
When you are off the field, these footballers often show luxury through their lifestyle. Some lifestyle supports that are shown are vehicles, houses, and clothes.
Not only that, there are expensive accessories. One of the accessories that is often shown is a watch. For many people, these objects can be a symbol of luxury of the wearer. Some soccer players often show their luxury watches when off the field.
What is the price of these luxury players? The following explanation.
